import sys
def add(n):
        sub = 0
        if n%2 == 0:
                sub = n/4
        else:
                sub = (n/2 + 1)/2
                
	s = n * (n + 1) / 4;
	s = s - sub;
	return s

def main():
    stdin = sys.stdin
    T = int(stdin.readline())
    for i in xrange(T):
        print add(int(stdin.readline()))

        
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
